subject: Baseball
Yankee Stadium (NYC)
lead_paragraph: Because the season opener with the Toronto Blue Jays was rained out, Joe Girardi had to wait until Tuesday night to ponder being such an integral part of the final opener at Yankee Stadium.
snippet: Because the season opener with the Toronto Blue Jays was rained out, Joe Girardi had to wait until Tuesday night to ponder being such an integral part of the final opener at Yankee Stadium.
